sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RETENTION is defined by Mr Locke to be, a faculty of the mind, whereby it keeps or retains thoſe fimple ideas it has once received, by ſenſation or reſiec-tion. See Metaphysics, Part I. Chap. ii.

p.hi: Retention is alſo uſed, in medicine, &c. for the ſtate of contraction in the ſolids or vaſcular parts of the body, which makes them hold faſt their proper eon-tents. In this ſenſe, retention is cppoſed to evacuation and excretion.
